src/preprocessing/preprocessing.py.title: Syntax Error: Misplaced Colon in Function Definition
src/preprocessing/preprocessing.py.details: The function 'load_data' has a misplaced colon immediately after the return type annotation, causing a syntax error. Python requires the colon to directly follow the return type annotation with no space.
